mapper.select: SELECT S.*,M.* FROM USER_STU S JOIN MAJOR M ON S.MAJOR = M.MAJOR WHERE STU_ID = #{stuId}
SELECT S.SUBJECT_DETAIL , SUM(S.SUBJECT_SCORE) AS SCORE FROM REGISTER R JOIN SUBJECT S ON R.SUBJECT_NO = S.SUBJECT_NO WHERE STU_ID = #{stuId} GROUP BY S.SUBJECT_DETAIL
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(sq_no),0)+1 FROM SUBJECT_QNA
INSERT INTO subject_qna(sq_no,subject_no,stu_id,sq_title,sq_contents,sq_date,major,pro_id,stu_name) VALUES(#{sqNo},#{subjectNo},#{stuId},#{sqTitle},#{sqContents},sysdate,#{major},#{proId},#{stuName})
mapper.select: SELECT pro_id FROM subject WHERE subject_no=#{subjectNo} and subject_name=#{subjectName}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM subject_qna WHERE sq_no=#{sqNo} and stu_id=#{stuId}
